page.title: 01INTRODUCING THE AREA
page.content: This is an area of contrast.The busy container and passenger terminal at {Parkeston Quay,}and the{Carless Oil {Refinery}differ sharply from the peace and natural beauty of{Copperas Wood {Nature Reserve}on the south side of the{River Stour.}The Victorian village of{Parkeston},and the more modern housing at{Upper Dovercourt}contrast with the Stour and the{farmland}on both sides of the river.The river's tidal flow alternately covering and exposing the mudflats provides food for many water birds.The Stour is also a link with the expanding port at Mistley to the west, and is used by numerous small craft for recreation. The{'Banger Racing'}circuit overlooks the{Golf Course}and the up-to-date Portals Engineering factory stands alongside the 14th century{All Saint's {Church.
